headline: 40 stocks likely to outperform in 2026: Boyar pres. explains
summary: Boyar Research is out with its "Forgotten Forty" list, comprising 40 overlooked stocks that are most likely to outperform this year. Boyar Research president, Jonathan Boyar, joins Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to discuss a few of the names and explain why he sees upside in 2026. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
